DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator aim overview patient specific non-specific complication admit intensive care unit follow endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography fatal course facility
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator retrospectively review patient underwent elective emergent endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography semi-prone position pharyngeal anesthesia ( lidocaine spray ) routine monitoring ( include electrocardiography , non-invasive blood pressure , peripheral capillary oxygen saturation ) standard sedation protocol ( midazolam 0.02 mgkg-1 ; fentanyl , 1 mgkg-1 ; propofol 1 mgkg-1 ) 2011 2016 approval local ethic committee Umraniye Training Hospital .
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent elective emergent ERCP semiprone position routine monitoring standard sedation protocol Patients discharge ward treatment followup ICU
